item.description:
Join me for lunch at Osaka, it has great atmosphere and above average food.  We will sample a prix fixe three-course lunch for $20.13 plus tax and tips, you buy your own beverage.  There is also a prix fixe two-course lunch for $15.13, you buy your own beverage and this light lunch option is depending on availability.

We have a table reserved for us and need an accurate headcount for the restaurant.  Please only RSVP "yes" if you can make it and update your RSVP to a "no" if you need to cancel with a 24 hour notice or you will be considered a "no show".

Thank you for your understanding.

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a table reserved for us under Betty.
item.name: Osaka Japanese Sush & Steak House for Restaurant Week
